page.title: 15TIMSBURY FEMALE FASHIONS(3)
page.content: {SHOES.} Children seem to enjoy wearing high heeled shoes,slip-ons,low-heeled shoes and shoes with straps,as long as they are all brightly coloured. Teenagers are especially keen on wearing dark slip-on shoes.They don't seem to like any other type of shoe. Adults like all kinds of shoes as long as they are not brightly coloured. Slip-on shoes are popular with all. {HATS. These are seldom liked.A few berets and hats with veils were worn occasionally by children.One brave teenager liked to wear a cap.Guide hats are worn but disliked by all but one guide.Solitary adults wore berets,woolly hats,hoods and veiled hats. {(Continued) { By Rebecca,Naomi,Gaenor and Juliette.
